## CharityORG.setVolunteerTask() method

Set a charity volunteer to task.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setVolunteerTask(memberName: string, taskName: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  memberName | string | Name of charity volunteer to assign. |
|  taskName | string | Task to assign. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the charity volunteer was successfully assigned to the task, false otherwise.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 2 GB

Attempts to assign the specified volunteer to the specified task. If an invalid task is specified, the volunteer will be set to idle (“Unassigned”).
